name: Himchan
dialog: P_name! Do you want to practice hopping today?

name: 주인공
dialog: It was difficult for me to hop last time when we played tag.

name: Himchan
dialog: It was difficult for me too, so I wanted to practice with you.

name: Himchan
dialog: We will practice while playing the Hopping game.

name: Himchan
dialog: First, draw a starting line and choose one person to be the "catcher."

name: Himchan
dialog: Everyone except the "catcher" hops forward as far as they can from the starting line.

name: Himchan
dialog: Then, they turn around and face the starting line.

name: Himchan
dialog: The person who is the “catcher” stays at the starting line and reaches out to touch the other P_names.

name: Himchan
dialog: If the "catcher" touches someone, that person becomes the “catcher.”

name: Himchan
dialog: If the "catcher" fails to touch anyone, they have to hop back into the starting line with one foot.

name: Himchan
dialog: If they touch or step over the starting line, they become the "catcher."

name: Himchan
dialog: After hopping with one foot, they hop with two feet, three feet, and up to ten feet, but the person who is the "catcher" always hops one foot less than the others.

name: Himchan
dialog: If everyone hops with three feet, the "catcher" only hops with two feet.

name: Himchan
dialog: When they finish hopping ten feet, everyone has to come back to the starting line doing the action the “catcher” asks for.

name: Himchan
dialog: The "catcher" then catches the people who cannot do the action.

name: Himchan
dialog: The actions that the "catcher" asks for include duck walk, bunny hop, and turtle walk.

name: Himchan
dialog: Wouldn't it be fun to practice hopping? Okay, let's get started! Wahahaha.

name: Himchan
dialog: < Afterwards, the story concludes with a scene of Himchan and the protagonist taking a leap in the air>
